vendor_name: Yada Xishan, in the Unbound Collection
title: Elegant Yixing Mountain China Hideaway with Indoor Pool & Onsite Dining
description:
The serene beauty of China's mountainous and river-laced landscape awaits with a stay at this tranquil retreat. Nestled in nature, the hotel offers an exceptional blend of luxury and calm, featuring two dining options - JUNIAN, serving elevated all-day dining and The Brook, a chic lounge offering handcrafted cocktails and tapas to close your evening in style.

Unwind with a swim in the elegant indoor pool, recharge in the spacious fitness centre or rest in the comfort of your sophisticated room. To truly embrace the spirit of Yixing, venture into the lush expanse of Yixing National Forest Park, waiting to be explored.
location_description: Yada Xishan Hotel Yixing, In The Unbound Collection By Hyatt
